Package index

Multimodal Marginal Epistasis Analysis

Functions for the marginal epistasis analysis.

mme()
Multimodal Marginal Epistasis Test (MME)

Simulate Quantitative Traits

Functions for simulating quantitative traits with pairwise epistasis.

simulate_traits()
Simulate Quantitative Traits from PLINK Genotypes

Utility Functions

Utility functions.

approximate_memory_requirements()
Estimate Memory Requirements for MME Routine
create_hdf5_file()
Create an HDF5 File
read_hdf5_dataset()
Read Dataset from an HDF5 File
write_hdf5_dataset()
Write Data to an HDF5 Dataset

RDA data files for illustration purposes.
